reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 391/95: DESIGNATION - TARO AGGREGATES LTD.
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 391/95: DESIGNATION - TARO AGGREGATES LTD.
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. In this Regulation,  “Taro Aggregates Ltd.” includes, (a) any person related to Taro Aggregates Ltd. or Philip Environmental Inc. by ownership, and (b) any person who is a party to a contract with Taro Aggregates Ltd. or Philip Environmental Inc. respecting any undertaking described in section 2. O. Reg. 391/95, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Taro Aggregates Ltd.” includes,

(a) any person related to Taro Aggregates Ltd. or Philip Environmental Inc. by ownership, and

(b) any person who is a party to a contract with Taro Aggregates Ltd. or Philip Environmental Inc. respecting any undertaking described in section 2. O. Reg. 391/95, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Any enterprise or activity by Taro Aggregates Ltd. of disposing solid non-hazardous waste from industrial, commercial and institutional sources on Lots 25 and 26, Concession VI, City of Stoney Creek, Regional Municipality of Hamilton-Wentworth is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 391/95, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Any enterprise or activity by Taro Aggregates Ltd. of disposing solid non-hazardous waste from industrial, commercial and institutional sources on Lots 25 and 26, Concession VI, City of Stoney Creek, Regional Municipality of Hamilton-Wentworth is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 391/95, s. 2.
